description: This file provides mock data and utility functions for a frontend application, simulating backend responses for assets, transcripts, quotes, and export jobs, primarily used for testing or fallback purposes.

methods.name: getMockUploadResponse
methods.description: Returns a mock response for an asset upload, indicating completion and providing asset details.

methods.name: getMockUploadStatus
methods.description: Returns a mock status update for an asset, including transcript ID and processing message.

methods.name: getMockTranscriptList
methods.description: Returns a list containing the mock transcript object.

methods.name: getMockQuoteList
methods.description: Returns the list of mock quote objects.

methods.name: getMockQuote
methods.description: Retrieves a specific quote by ID from the mock quotes list.

methods.name: getMockExportJob
methods.description: Returns a mock export job object with quote IDs and status.

methods.name: getMockExportResult
methods.description: Generates a combined string of quote texts from the mock export quote IDs.

methods.name: isMockMode
methods.description: Returns whether mock mode is enabled.
